name: Cisco | IOSXR | Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range (SYSLOG)
description: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-4-CARD_VOLTAGE_ALARM : Voltage sensor alarm slot 0/RSP1/CPU0, sensor VP1P2_SERDES_PLL_DAO measured 2499 mV and out of operational range 1165 - 1235 mV
event_class__name: Environment | DC Voltage Out of Range

patterns.value_re: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-4-CARD_VOLTAGE_ALARM : Voltage sensor alarm (?P<name>slot \S+, sensor\S+) measured (?P<measure>\d+ mV) and out of operational range (?P<min>\d+) - (?P<max>\d+ mV)

name: Cisco | IOSXR | Environment | DC Voltage Returned to Normal Range (SYSLOG)
description: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-4-CARD_VOLTAGE_ALARM_CLEAR : Voltage sensor alarm cleared slot 0/RSP1/CPU0, sensor VP1P2_SERDES_PLL_DAO measured 1200 mV and returned to operational range
event_class__name: Environment | DC Voltage Returned to Normal Range

patterns.value_re: %PLATFORM-ENVMON-4-CARD_VOLTAGE_ALARM_CLEAR : Voltage sensor alarm cleared (?P<name>slot \S+, sensor\S+) measured (?P<measure>\d+ mV) and returned to operational range
